_comment: Inline configuration template for pipeline node settings
_usage: Embed this in the 'normalizer.config' field of your pipeline node

identifier_mappings._comment: Map source ID fields to namespace suffixes
identifier_mappings._rules: Empty string uses prefix directly, '-SUFFIX' appends to prefix, 'ABSOLUTE' uses as-is

title_mappings._comment: Map source title/description fields to MEC LocalizedInfo elements

people_field_mappings._comment: Map source people fields to MEC JobFunction values

rating_system_mappings._comment: Map rating system identifiers to region (country) codes
